exclude_dirs: .git, .svn, .hg, .venv, venv, node_modules, __pycache__, *.egg-info, .mypy_cache, .pytest_cache, .tox, .idea, .vscode, .vs, build, dist, .cache, .coverage, .serverless, .terraform, .stack-work, .next, .nuxt, .DS_Store, migrations, .gradle, locale, *secret*, .svelte-kit
target_files: README.md, Dockerfile, docker-compose.yml, requirements.txt, package.json, svelte.config.js, tsconfig.json, *.config.ts, manifest.json
